description:
As the founder of Fedora, I frequently have people ask me what the best resource I recommend to get started with creating and selling online courses.

After scouring the Internet for appropriate resources and not finding anything, I decided to take matters into my own hands (with the help of Fedora growth master Andy Guttormsen) -- together, we are pleased to bring you the 7 Steps to Creating Your First Profitable Online Course.

Across the 5k+ instructors from who we have seen first hand data, almost all successful courses fall into the exact same pattern, following the exact same sequence of events to launching a successful course -- in the next 60 minutes, I walk you through exactly what those steps are so you can launch your first profitable course in the next 30 days.

See you inside the course.

- @ankurnagpal
title: 7 Steps to Creating Your First Profitable Online Course
